content.html: I am still really a vim dabbler, but should I invest my time in discovering neovim or really learning vim. Don't know enough about neovim to know if vim mastery would benefit both in the long run. //cc @ianbattersby ?
content.value:
I am still really a vim dabbler, but should I invest my time in discovering neovim or really learning vim. Don't know enough about neovim to know if vim mastery would benefit both in the long run.

//cc @ianbattersby ?
